name: Sport-Video-Analysis-OpenCV
description: Lightweight Cpp OpenCV project for automatic football video analysis: detects players on the pitch, clusters them into teams by jersey color, generates per-team heatmaps, and includes an evaluation tool to compare results against YOLO detections using IoU metrics.

name: Life-Calendar
description: The Life Calendar project is a simple application purely for visulizing your age.

description: This program demonstrates an interactive image segmentation technique using OpenCV.

name: GestureOS
description: GestureOS is a Python-based gesture recognition system that lets you control your Windows PC with hand signs using your webcam. Perform actions like media control, mouse movement, tab switching, and more â€” all touch-free.

name: Object_Detection-OpenCV

name: FactGCN
description: This project focuses on implementing FastGCN, a scalable alternative to traditional GCNs that leverages importance sampling to improve efficiency. Additionally, we explore adaptive sampling techniques to further enhance accuracy and computational performance.

name: Emotion_Detection
description: This project uses OpenCV, Mediapipe, and DeepFace to detect faces and analyze emotions, age, gender, and race in real-time from video streams.

name: Weather-Classification
description: This project demonstrates a weather classification model using TensorFlow, applied to four different datasets. The notebook provides a step-by-step approach to build, train, and evaluate to classify weather conditions.

name: ROS-Intelligent-Robotics
description: This is a project for Intelligent Robotics course at unipd. Done with Robot Operating System (ROS) to control a robot in realworld, and simulated in Gazebo.
